function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and airborne infections","Mitigation":"Implementing proper ventilation systems and air filtration, conducting regular maintenance","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, ventilation monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, workers","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Poor sanitation and hygiene practices","Impact":"Higher likelihood of contamination and disease spread","Mitigation":"Enforcing strict sanitation protocols, providing hand hygiene facilities, promoting hygienic practices","Technologies":"Automatic hand sanitizers, touchless faucets, UV disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff, visitors","Owner":"Facility managers, cleaning companies"},{"Description":"Overcrowding and congestion in public spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of close contact and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Limiting occupancy, improving traffic flow, creating designated waiting areas","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, crowd control barriers, digital signage for traffic management","People":"Public space users, visitors, service staff","Owner":"Public space managers, local authorities"}]}
